articles.author: John Hand
articles.title: Inside the crimes of Gerry 'The Monk' Hutch as mob boss arrested after European manhunt - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The fallen gang boss will almost certainly be sent home to face trial for allegedly masterminding the Regency Hotel attack
articles.content:
From running a teenage gang, Gerry Hutch became one of the wealthiest criminals in the State, suspected of masterminding a series of bank robberies.
Nicknamed The Monk for his clean living, he left … [+5661 chars]
